member.name: M:DataManipulationLibrary.CustomFunctions.SaveBinaryData(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Byte[]},System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Code purpose:
- Saves the byte[] binary to a file at the chosen
member.param: - flag for not overwriting the contents in the file
- flag for showing info about the process
